actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide education to students in grades 8, 9, and 10 about the importance of higher education.
short_title: Higher Education Preparation Program Act of 2004

summary.text: Higher Education Preparation Program Act of 2004 - Directs the Secretary of Education to award: (1) a competitive grant to a nonprofit organization to develop a curriculum-based higher education preparation program curriculum for students in grades eight, nine, and ten; and (2) competitive grants to up to five State educational agencies to use such curriculum in a demonstration project for providing higher education preparation programs to students in such grades in middle and secondary schools.

titles.title: Higher Education Preparation Program Act of 2004
A bill to provide education to students in grades 8, 9, and 10 about the importance of higher education.
